QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hamstring strain - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: A strain is when a muscle becomes overstretched and tears. This painful injury is also called a "pulled muscle." If you have strained your hamstring, you have pulled one or more of the muscles on the back of your upper leg (thigh).
